alert_text: Strong winds and rough sea conditions expected along east coast with heavy rainfall in coastal districts.

Very heavy rainfall with strong winds expected across coastal regions as the system strengthens.
Low pressure over sea region expected to move inland causing flooding rains.
Severe marine conditions and gale-force winds expected near the coast.
System over land causing prolonged rainfall and gusty winds in interior districts.
